javadoc:
A model to generate the suggested completions, given a viable prefix.
@param <T> the type of suggestions this model gives.

methods.name: computeCompletions
methods.comment: Compute a collection of possible completions to the given text (prefix).

params.name: text
params.comment: the prefix, i.e., the text to the left of the user's caret.

return.comment: a (possibly null or empty) list of suggested completions.

name: AutocompletionModel
comment: A model to generate the suggested completions, given a viable prefix.
